summary:
Hello!
This amazing mod replaces a portion of the music in Skyrim for the amazing symphony of LOTR by Howard Shore.
See the long description for details!
descriptionHtml:
Hello!
This amazing mod replaces a portion of the music in Skyrim for the amazing symphony of LOTR by Howard Shore. This mod replaces the following music in Skyrim:
-combat
-dungeon
-explore
-special (the main theme)
-tavern
-town

Why did you make the mod?

I just got bored of the same old Skyrim music, so i added the amazing songs from the greatest movie trilogy, The Lord Of The Rings. 

Installation:

Just simply download with NMM!

Uninstallation:

Just simply uninstall the mod in NMM!

Recommended:

Turn the \"Music\" slider all the way to the right for the best effect!

Thank you for your time, i hope this makes playing Skyrim much nicer!
author: Thorowmier
